title: Uncle Dominic's Touch
description: Where do we draw the line between love and desire?Chloe has always loved to spend time at Aunt Clara and her husband's cottage during the summer. The problem is she loves Uncle Dominic more than a niece should.With Aunt Clara now out of the picture, Chloe needs to show her uncle just how hot she burns for him, and prove that what they feel for each other is not wrong, no matter what he or anyone else thinks.Maybe not a conventional relationship, but no one can help who they fall in love with. Even if it is...wickedly taboo.---Be Warned: anal sex, incest (not blood related)
author: Jenika Snow
